Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: The upscale-ish, restaurant style interior may give off a different kind of vibe than your typical hole-in-the-wall-yet-super authentic/divine Surinamese eatery but don't be fooled folks: the food here is healthy, booming with flavour and â€¦

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Very good and authentic Surinamese food. Lot of different options for food, beer and alcohol. Rates for all items are quite reasonable and food quantity is quite large. The staff is quite friendly. Only downside is that the menu is in Dutch (but Google Translate does a fairly good job).

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: First time eater of Surinese foods, was really impressed with the complex flavours in the Roti Kipfillet, so flavourful and mouth-watering! It was a shame that I found this place on my last day because I would definitely go back there! â€¦

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: This surinamese food is delicious and spicy! I had the vegetarian roti and it was fantastic, and and a big size plate. The place has two separate parts. One is for take away sandwiches and the other part is a restaurant. Totally recommended!

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Great vegetarian/vegan roti. Take away is on the side of the restaurant. My favorite roti in Amsterdam. Roti is a very simple dish from Suriname, it has Indian spices and you can ask for spices on the side.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Very spicy Surinamese food. Relaxed, modern interior. I ordered a saoto soup (which came with rice), bakkeljauw picante broodje (spicy salt cod baguette sandwich) and a portion of Pom. The yellow chilli sauce that I had with it was the â€¦

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Friendly service and amazing food (hot sauce is super good too) , homely atmosphere!  Love it!

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Amazing Surinamese restaurant, make sure you try the Roti with lamb, it's delicious.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: First time in Amsterdam and my boyfriend and I were looking for something to eat. This place was delicious! Amazing flavors!! The service was great and the waitress was so friendly and helpful (considering the menu is in Dutch and all we â€¦

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Interesting food some spicy, very little English spoken though so was difficult to choose

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Outstanding service and the flavours were incredible. If this wasnâ€™t our last night here, we would be coming back again!

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Casual but amazing. I visit this place every time I come to Amsterdam for the most delicious food from Suriname which was a former colony of the Netherlands that you can ever imagine. This place is not fancy it is not white tablecloth however it is delicious!

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: By far the best veggie roti I have ever had and super affordable! It is a must try if you live in the Oost!

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Tasty generous plates, lovely roti and friendly service

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Couldn't stop eating. Food was absolutely delicious. Ended up taking half of the roti home to finish later that evening. Service was good considering there was only one lovely smiling lady waiting the tables of the busy restaurant, however â€¦

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: The food was very different and tasty. A little bit expensive but was worth it.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: First time eating Suriname food it was good. They don't have an English menu or speak much English, that did not bother me but may deter others. Very well priced though and tasty I would go back. Very prompt too despite being busy.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text:
This is hands down the best Roti I know to exist.

Me and a group of friends get roti here often, and it's amazing every, single, â€¦

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: My favourite place to get roti in town, really has no match. The goat and duck roti are simply amazing. The portions are good and the prices are very decent. It has a take away and a restaurant part were you can sit down.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: The food was decent but this restaurant is nothing special and lacking character. we felt the waitress was trying to get us to buy more food when we didn't want to. Additionally, they only have one red wine on their menu.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Love the food here, really tasty. Good value/price and good portions. Both for take away as for eating in. Very kind people as well. One of my favourite Surinam food places!

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text:
Great roti and other snacks like fried cassava with dried spicy cod. The tofu and tempeh of the vegetarian roti are on the sweet side, and the fried plantains can be a bit oily. Other than that I love this place!
It's very clean and the staff is friendly.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text:
Surinamese food at its best, not to mention the satÃ© sauce. Donâ€™t forget to order the satÃ© sauce!
ðŸ¥°

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: No pretenses. Just good food. Fresh buns!

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: I always order their specialty for take away which is roti kip: pancake filled with 'dal' with a side of vegetables, egg and chicken in a tasty sauce. Go here if you enjoy roti kip or as my wife calls it: rotkip (Polified)

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: In my opinion the best place to get roti in Amsterdam. The portions are grand and the accompanying spicy sauces are great. The vegetarian roti is my favorite.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Freshly made dishes. We enjoyed it a lot.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text:
best surinamees in Amsterdam east, pretty low priced. should be something unique to tourists who don't know the suriname cuisine yet
(cuisine is a combination of 3 continents and 6 cultures)

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Unpretentious, delicious Surinamese food in large portions. The place is decorated very sparsely - but you go there for the food. Friendly but slightly absent-minded service.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: One of the best roties in th neighbourhood. It's possible to takeaway food and to eat inside.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Fantastic food, good service. One of my favourites in the neighbourhoods

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: The staff is friendly. Although the menu is written in Dutch, the staff was able to walk us through the menu verbally. The food is phenomenal and I would come back here in a heartbeat when visiting again

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Serves great Suriname take away food. Can't wait for resumption of eat-in services

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Friendly staff, great atmosphere, and amazing food. Rotis were authentic and there was a large serving size for the kleine which made me happy. Would definitely visit again.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Asked if I could get the food in a reusable box that I brought. They didn't want that, and also couldn't tell me why not. That is really a pity, given the need to reduce waste in our societies.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Best Surinam restaurant in town. Good prices. Always share with a friend a dish with drinks this is about 30â‚¬. Popular in gay community and locals.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Best surinamese restaurant in Amsterdam. It has a side for take away, but busy on the weekends. Try the vegetarian roti. It's the best!

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Very tasty food from Surinam! The Roti is their specialty. Enough to choose from if you are a vegetarian.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Tasty, fresh, authentic Suriname food with a very friendly service and relaxed atmosphere. I love this restaurant!

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Best veggie roti Iâ€™ve ever ate!!

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: The Lalla Rookh was the first ship on which Indians immigrated to Surinam. Excellent roti and delicious bakabana.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: The quality of the food varies a lot, had some good experience but also some very bad ones. The lady at the take away counter has some arrogance issues.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: The place to be for surinameese food. My favourite is the bakabana mmm share a main dish to save room for the coconut ice-cream :)

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Fantastic restaurant with great vibes and authentic delicious food.  I would happily fly back from London for a meal here

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Great place. Showed up with 10 people and they were super accommodating. Food was great and fast.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Lovely food and a gracious, patient host who will walk you through the menu if you speak as little Dutch as I do.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: large roti portions are big enough for two! also get bakabana with peanut sauce!

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: One of the best Surinam-Indian fusion places. You xan eatinor takeawat around the corner.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: It's quite fancy for a Surinamese place, but the food is excellent.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Just try it, you won't be disappointed. The roti is scrumptious!

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Authentic surinamese food. The best I've had in a while. Home cooking away from home.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Good and cheap food but one big problem: they refuse to serve tap water. Very disappointing.

Name: Lalla Rookh
Review Text: Ok. Not great. Quick and very friendly service, the food was okay, tasty but not stellar.
